Command.name: backup-domain
Command.usage-text: backup-domain [--domaindir domain_directory] [--description description] [--echo=false] [--terse=false] [--verbose=false] [domain_name]

Command.name: restore-domain
Command.usage-text: restore-domain [--domaindir domain_directory] [--filename backup_filename] [--description description] [--terse=false] [--echo=false] [--verbose=false] [domain_name]

Command.name: list-backups
Command.usage-text: list-backups [--domaindir domain_directory] [--terse=false] [--echo=false] [--verbose=false] [domain_name]

Command.name: install-addon
Command.usage-text: install-addon [--terse=false] [--echo=false] installer_plugin

Command.name: uninstall-addon
Command.usage-text: uninstall-addon [--terse=false] [--echo=false] addon-name

Command.name: create-domain
Command.usage-text: create-domain [--user admin] [--adminport port_number] [--terse=false] [--echo=false] [--interactive=true] [--domaindir domain_directory] [--profile profile_name] [--template domain_template] [--passwordfile filename ] [--instanceport port_number] [--savemasterpassword=false] [--domainproperties (name=value)[:name=value]*] [--portbase portbase] [--savelogin=false] [--checkports=true] domain_name

Command.name: delete-domain
Command.usage-text: delete-domain [--terse=false] [--echo=false] [--domaindir domain_directory] domain_name

Command.name: start-domain
Command.usage-text: start-domain [--terse=false] [--echo=false] [--interactive=true] [--user admin_user] [--passwordfile file_name] [--domaindir domain_directory] [--verbose=false] [--debug=false] [domain_name]

Command.name: stop-domain
Command.usage-text: stop-domain [--terse=false] [--echo=false] [--domaindir domain_directory] [domain_name]

Command.name: list-domains
Command.usage-text: list-domains [--terse=false] [--echo=false] [--domaindir domain_directory]

Command.name: deploy
Command.usage-text: deploy [--terse=false] [--echo=false] [--interactive=true] [--host localhost] [--port 4848|4849] [--secure | -s] [--user admin_user] [--passwordfile file_name] [--virtualservers virtual_servers] [--contextroot context_root] [--force=true] [--precompilejsp=false] [--verify=false] [--name component_name] [--upload=true] [--retrieve local_dirpath] [--dbvendorname dbvendorname] [--createtables=true|false | --dropandcreatetables=true|false] [--uniquetablenames=true|false] [--deploymentplan deployment_plan] [--enabled=true] [--generatermistubs=false] [--availabilityenabled=false] [--libraries jar_file[(pathseparator)jar_file]*] [--target target(Default server)] filepath

Command.usage-text: asadmin show-jbi-service-engine [--terse=false] [--echo=false] [--interactive=true] [--host localhost] [--port 4848|4849] [--secure | -s] [--user admin_user] [--passwordfile file_name] [--target target(Default server)] service_assembly_name

Command.name: show-jbi-binding-component
Command.usage-text: asadmin show-jbi-binding-component [--terse=false] [--echo=false] [--interactive=true] [--host localhost] [--port 4848|4849] [--secure | -s] [--user admin_user] [--passwordfile file_name] [--target target(Default server)] service_assembly_name

Command.name: show-jbi-shared-library
Command.usage-text: asadmin show-jbi-shared-library [--terse=false] [--echo=false] [--interactive=true] [--host localhost] [--port 4848|4849] [--secure | -s] [--user admin_user] [--passwordfile file_name] [--target target(Default server)] service_assembly_name

Command.name: upgrade-jbi-component
Command.usage-text: asadmin upgrade-jbi-component [--terse=false] [--echo=false] [--interactive=true] [--enabled=true] [--properties=(name=value)[:name=value]*|property file] [--upload=true] [--host localhost] [--port 4848|4849] [--secure | -s] [--user admin_user] [--passwordfile file_name] filepath

Command.name: monitor
Command.usage-text: monitor --type monitor_type --user admin_user [--terse=false] [--echo=false] [--interactive=true] [--host localhost] [--port 4848|4849] [--secure | -s] [--passwordfile file_name] [--interval 30] [--filter filter] [--filename filename] instance_name
